5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Commune
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: You contact your deity or a divine proxy and ask up to three questions that can be answered with a yes or no.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Contagion
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: Your touch inflicts disease. Make a melee spell attack against a creature you can reach.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Dispel Evil and Good
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: Shimmering energy surrounds and protects you from fey, undead, and creatures originating from beyond the Material Plane.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Flame Strike
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the heavens in a location you specify.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Geas
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range, forcing it to carry out some service or refrain from some action or course of activity as you decide.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Greater Restoration
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Hallow
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a point and infuse an area around it with holy (or unholy) power.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Insect Plague
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Legend Lore
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: Name or describe a person, place, or object. The spell brings to your mind a brief summary of the significant lore about the thing you named.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Mass Cure Wounds
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Planar Binding
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: With this spell, you attempt to bind a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend to your service.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Raise Dead
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: You return a dead creature you touch to life, provided that it has been dead no longer than 10 days.

5thLevelClericSpells.Name: Scrying
5thLevelClericSpells.Description: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you.
